control_attributes.Control: SC-42 (1) REPORTING TO AUTHORIZED INDIVIDUALS OR ROLES
control_attributes.control_description: The organization ensures that the information system is configured so that data or information collected by the [Assignment: organization-defined sensors] is only reported to authorized individuals or roles.

Control Statement: The organization ensures that the information system is configured so that data or information collected by the [Assignment: organization-defined sensors] is only reported to authorized individuals or roles.
